properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, I come, I confess Bowing here I find my rest Without You I fall apart You’re the One that guides my heart{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, I need You, Oh, I need You Every hour I need You My one defense, my righteousness Oh God, how I need You{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Where sin runs deep Your grace is more Where grace is found is where You are Where You are Lord, I am free Holiness is Christ in me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, I need You, Oh, I need You Every hour I need You My one defense, my righteousness Oh God, how I need You{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Teach my song to rise to You When temptation comes my way When I cannot stand I’ll fall on You Jesus, You’re my hope and stay{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, I need You, Oh, I need You Every hour I need You My one defense, my righteousness Oh God, how I need You{/lang-eng}
